content:
Hi! My name is Andres (a.k.a Dede) and I’m a research engineer in AI and HPC. Welcome to my tiny, legally purchased part of the internet where I mainly post ramblings about topics that interest me.
My stuff is organized in a more regular TIL (“today I learned”) where I write small posts about new things I have learned. This is mostly meant for me, but if it helps someone else, great!
The other part is my blog, where I will try to go more in depth about some advanced/technical topics, albeit with less frequency.
My main interests are in AI, HPC, Nix, Python, and Rust, but since this is my “dung pile of thoughts”, anything is fair game!
Hope you enjoy :)
title: HomePage

content:
Welcome to my Blog section where I dive into more advanced/technical topics. These are things that took me some time to figure out and that are not so well documented in other places.
In general, I try to not repeat other content you can find around the internet and actually contribute something new.
I also post about some of my side projects here :)
title: Blog

content:
Welcome to my TIL section where I try to post about new things I have learned. They can be quite variable in length and complexity, and don’t necessarily follow a specific order.
The idea is to document my learning journey and be able to quickly reference old things I have learned but perhaps forgotten.
title: Today I Learned
